parallel.distributed

Class DConditionCounterResetRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DConditionCounterResetRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DMsgIntf

    public class DConditionCounterResetRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements DMsgIntf
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to reset its associated ConditionCounter. Not for use as part of the normal public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
